exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rbar_opp_involutive (Rbar_opp (Rbar_opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment x : Rbar Unable to unify "Rbar_plus ?M2283 0 = ?M2283" with "match Rbar_plus' x match x with | Finite x => - x | p_infty => m_infty | m_infty => p_infty end with | Some z => z | None => 0 end = 0".

original: unfold Rbar_minus, Rbar_plus, Rbar_opp. rewrite Rbar_opp_involutive. apply Rbar_plus_0_r.
